text:
Narendra Jha (2 September 1962 – 14 March 2018) was an Indian actor. Jha is known for his work in Bollywood productions; his most noted movies being "Haider", "Raees", "Ghayal Once Again", "Hamari Adhuri Kahani", "Mohenjo Daro", "Shorgul", "My Father Iqbal", "Force 2", "Kaabil", "2016 The End".
Jha died at his farmhouse in Nashik early on 14 March 2018 after suffering a massive heart attack. He was 55 years old.
